title: Cyberczar
author: Cyberczar
content: Does anyone know a good app that publishes breaking NFT news? I'd appreciate knowing about them. Thanks.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: You can have this news on the known Coindesk and Cointelegraph, they've got a dedicated tag for "NFT" on their websites.(https://www.coindesk.com/tag/nfts/)(https://cointelegraph.com/tags/nft)I just need a browser for it but both has an app, so, you can download them if that's what you want.

comments.author: NFTmetria
comments.body: All excellent mood. NFTmetria.com - On the pages of our site, we talk in detail about the NFT industry. We talk about trends and news from the world of NFTs and cryptocurrencies. We talk in detail about the most popular NFT artists and NFT collections!

comments.author: kelonmusk
comments.body: You can follow cryptonews.com or cointelegraph.com. However, if you're looking for more frequent updates, following NFT-focused social media accounts like niftygateway, opensea, and SuperRare_co on Twitter can provide you with real-time updates and breaking news.

comments.author: merekamo
comments.body: You can try visit cryptopanic.com. It's a great app that aggregates news from all over the web, including Twitter, Reddit, and various news outlets. It also has a customizable filter system that allows you to focus on the topics and sources that matter most to you.The second, of course CoinMarketCap. While it's not solely focused on NFT news, it does cover a lot of the major developments in the crypto world, including NFTs. It's also a great resource for tracking prices and market trends, so it's definitely worth considering.
